summary: Luxury car showcase app with Rolls-Royce-inspired premium theme. Cars have a 'Buy Now' button that opens a detailed checkout flow (EMI plans, booking amount vs full price, card/UPI fields) along with nearest showroom info (different locations across India with random contact numbers).

existing_features.title: Add a 'Buy Now' button to each car model card (CarModelCard.tsx) that opens a full checkout modal/drawer when clicked.

Implement a detailed checkout flow inside the modal with three steps: (1) Select payment type â€” full price or booking amount (partial deposit); (2) Choose EMI plan if full price is selected (e.g., 6, 12, 24 months with calculated monthly instalment shown in INR); (3) Payment details form with card fields (card number, name on card, expiry, CVV) and a UPI ID field as an alternative. The final step shows a simulated success confirmation screen.

Display nearest showroom information alongside the checkout flow. Each car model should be assigned a distinct showroom in a different Indian city (e.g., Mumbai, Delhi, Bangalore, Chennai, Hyderabad, Kolkata, Pune, Ahmedabad). Each showroom entry must include: showroom name, full address, city, and a plausible but fake Indian contact phone number (10-digit mobile starting with 9 or 8).

Store showroom data (name, address, city, phone) mapped to car model IDs in the frontend content layer (e.g., a new file frontend/src/content/showrooms.ts) so each car resolves to exactly one showroom.
